main event: An object, described as circular in shape, was seen in the sky in the Pirapora area of Brazil. It was illuminated and emitting a pulsing light and sound. It moved rapidly across the sky.
interesting points: The object had a metallic aspect and the set of green lights was similar to navigation lights on airplanes.
The object was dark colored and its diameter was estimated at 10-15 meters.
The astronomers could not determine the exact distance of the object from the earth, but estimated it to be more than 30 kilometers away.
Astronomers in Rio de Janeiro observed a circular or elliptical object that was about 10 meters in diameter, moving at an estimated speed of 1,200 km/h.
The object was seen by multiple witnesses, including astronomers and military personnel, in various locations in Brazil.
location: Pirapora, Brazil; Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
